member.name: IUIAnimationTimerUpdateHandler.ClearTimerClientEventHandler
member.summary: Clears the handler for timer client status change events.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerUpdateHandler.OnUpdate
member.summary: Handles update events from the timer.
member.param: The current timer time, in seconds.
Receives a member of the enumeration, indicating whether any animation variables changed as a result of the update.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerUpdateHandler.SetTimerClientEventHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for timer client status change events.
member.param: A handler for timer client events. The specified object must implement.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerUpdateHandler
member.summary: Defines methods for handling timing update events.
